• ⿺ Surround from lower left
    • 辶 [ chuò ] to walk; walking
    • 回 [ huí ] to return, to turn around; a time
heisig_chinese_memo: Many cities have a freeway road which revolves (circles) around the city allowing everyone to return home.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Many cities have a freeway road which revolves (circles) around the city allowing everyone to return home.
humanum_full_description_en:
"回" has many meanings. Later, the word "回" was differentiated to mean rotation. "Jade articles. "Yubu": "Return, turn also." Western Han Yangxiong "Tai Xuan. "Tai Xuan Nian": "Going back every day, rigid and flexible." "Selected Works. Emperor Wei Wen's "Goodness and Going": "The river flows in the soup and the river, and there is a boat in the middle, which revolves with the waves, and there is a tour like a guest." Tang Dynasty Li He "Changping Arrow Song" "Returning Wind to Send Guests Blowing Yin Water", Wang Qi's Note: "The return wind is the whirlwind."

" Return " also means roundabouts and twists. "Guang Yun. Team Rhyme: "Back, Song Ye." Such as "Huainanzi. "General Theory": "The mountain of the five elements of the husband, the place where the obstacles are blocked, so that my virtue can be overcome, and the world pays its tribute to return." Gao You's note: "Return, it is difficult." "Selected Works. "Mei Cheng "Seven Fats"", "I am in the vicinity of the river," Li Zhouhan's note: "Return to the river, Qujian is also." Tang Dynasty Du Fu "Ye Lao": "Ye Lao fence back to the river bank, Chai gate does not open by the river."

" Back " also means turning around and returning. "Guang Yun. Grey Rhyme: "Return, return." Such as "Historical Records. Family of Foreign Relations: "The imperial assistant vehicle, return the car, and go straight to Changle Palace." "Selected Works. Yang Ziyun "Ganquan Fu": "So after all the work was done, I went back and went back to the three mountain ranges."

" Back " of the various meanings of all can use " back " or " return " see " back ."
humanum_short_description_en: From "辵" to "回", it is a differentiated word of "回", which means rotation.
humanum_full_description:
「回」表示的意義有很多，後來分化出「迴」字表示旋轉的意思。《玉篇．辵部》：「迴，轉也。」西漢揚雄《太玄．太玄攡》：「天日迴行，剛柔接矣。」《文選．魏文帝〈善哉行〉》：「湯湯川流，中有行舟，隨波迴轉，有似客遊。」唐代李賀〈長平箭頭歌〉「迴風送客吹陰水」，王琦注：「迴風，即旋風。」

　　「迴」也表示迂迴、曲折。《廣韻．隊韻》：「迴，曲也。」如《淮南子．氾論》：「夫五行之山，固塞險阻之地也，使我德能覆之，則天下納其貢職者迴也。」高誘注：「迴，迂難也。」《文選．枚乘〈七發〉》「依絕區兮臨迴溪」，李周翰注：「迴溪，曲澗也。」唐代杜甫〈野老〉：「野老籬邊江岸迴，柴門不正逐江開。」

　　「迴」又表示轉頭、返回的意思。《廣韻．灰韻》：「迴，還也。」如《史記．外戚世家》：「詔副車載之，迴車馳還，而直入長樂宮。」《文選．楊子雲〈甘泉賦〉》：「於是事畢功弘，迴車而歸，度三巒兮偈棠黎。」

　　「迴」的各個義項皆可用「迴」或「回」，參見「回」。
humanum_short_description: 從「辵」從「回」，是「回」的分化字，表示旋轉的意思。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
迴
Pinyin: huí
English Definition: to curve; to return; to revolve
Total strokes: 10; Radical: 辵
Ideographic: To walk 辶 in circles 回; 回 also provides the pronunciation
Character Formation:
  • ⿺ Surround from lower left
    • 辶 [ chuò ] to walk; walking
    • 回 [ huí ] to return, to turn around; a time
Example Words:
巡迴 [ xún huí ]: to go around; to roam
巡迴分析端口 [ xún huí fēn xī duān kǒu ]: Roving Analysis Port; RAP
海马迴 [ hǎi mǎ huí ]: hippocampus
轮迴 [ lún huí ]: reincarnate
迴避 [ huí bì ]: avoid; sidestep; skirt (an issue)
More: 迴* | *迴 | *迴*

Compound 迴 mutants 𢌞逥 from spiral (回)囘囬 huí and (rem- 廴 yǐn) from road-and-foot 辶辶辵 chuò C240 迴<𢌞逥> A099 回[迴] simp 回. (name- turn-around (回)迴 huí)

「 回 」表示的意義有很多，後來分化出「 迴 」字表示旋轉的意思。《玉篇．辵部》：「迴，轉也。」西漢揚雄《太玄．太玄攡》：「天日迴行，剛柔接矣。」《文選．魏文帝〈善哉行〉》：「湯湯川流，中有行舟，隨波迴轉，有似客遊。」唐代李賀〈長平箭頭歌〉「迴風送客吹陰水」，王琦注：「迴風，即旋風。」 「 迴 」也表示迂迴、曲折。《廣韻．隊韻》：「迴，曲也。」如《淮南子．氾論》：「夫五行之山，固塞險阻之地也，使我德能覆之，則天下納其貢職者迴也。」高誘注：「迴，迂難也。」《文選．枚乘〈七發〉》「依絕區兮臨迴溪」，李周翰注：「迴溪，曲澗也。」唐代杜甫〈野老〉：「野老籬邊江岸迴，柴門不正逐江開。」 「 迴 」又表示轉頭、返回的意思。《廣韻．灰韻》：「迴，還也。」如《史記．外戚世家》：「詔副車載之，迴車馳還，而直入長樂宮。」《文選．楊子雲〈甘泉賦〉》：「於是事畢功弘，迴車而歸，度三巒兮偈棠黎。」 「 迴 」的各個義項皆可用「 迴 」或「 回 」，參見「 回 」。

迴字的基本解释

迴
huí
见“回”③。

迴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huí］
［《廣韻》户恢切，平灰，匣。］
［《廣韻》胡對切，去隊，匣。］
亦作“廻1”。亦作“逥1”。
(1)掉转；返回。
(2)旋转；翻转。
(3)运转；循环。
(4)重复某种动作或重现某种现象。
(5)环绕；围绕。
(6)曲折，迂回。
(7)迂回难行。
(8)避让；回避。
(9)改易；转变。
(10)收回成命。
(11)谓把所得的封赠呈请改授他人。
(12)追述，回忆。
(13)邪，邪恶。参见“迴邪”。
(14)量词。表示动作的次数。
(15)副词。相当于“再”、“又”、“復”。

迴字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　迴； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1255第16
【正韻】胡瑰切。與回同。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?胡對切，音潰。【廣韻】曲也。　【正字通】古無迴字。蓋回卽雷字。水囘爲囘，後人欲別之加辶。當作迴。迴字从囘作。

迴字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
迴字的起名意思

暂无。

huí

Back to
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huí］
["Guang Yun" Hu Hui cut, flat gray, box. ]
["Guangyun" Hu cuts, goes to the team, box. ]
Also known as "迴1". Also known as "Fu 1".
(1) Turn around; return.
(2) Rotate; flip.
(3) Operation; circulation.
(4) Repeat a certain action or reproduce a certain phenomenon.
(5) Surround; surround.
(6) Twists and turns.
(7) Difficult to turn around.
(8) Avoid; avoid.
(9) Change; change.
(10) Take it back to death.
(11) It is said that the obtained envelope petition is granted to others.
(12) Retelling, recalling.
(13) Evil, evil. See "Return to evil".
(14) Quantifiers. Indicates the number of actions.
(15) Adverbs. It is equivalent to "zai", "you" and "fu".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [辵字部] 　回; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 1255 16
[Positive rhyme] Hu Guiqi cut. Same with back.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Hu cut, the sound collapsed. [Guang Yun] Qu Ye.　【Zhengzitong】There is no answer in ancient times. Cover the word 卽雷. Shuihui is a return, and later generations want to be different. Treat it as a reply. Back to the word from the back to make.
